Method Detail

getPixelSizeID

java.lang.String getPixelSizeID()
Returns the ID of the pixel size setting.

Returns:
The ID of the pixel size setting.

getPixelSizeSettings

DeviceSettingDTO[] getPixelSizeSettings()
Returns all device settings corresponding to this pixel size.

Returns:
Set of device settings necessary for the pixel size setting to get active.

setPixelSizeSettings

void setPixelSizeSettings(DeviceSettingDTO[] newSettings,
                          int accessID)
                          throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                                 SettingException
Sets all device settings corresponding to this pixel size. All previously set settings get deleted.

Parameters:
newSettings - device settings which have to be active for this pixel size setting to be actual.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
SettingException

addPixelSizeSetting

void addPixelSizeSetting(DeviceSettingDTO setting,
                         int accessID)
                         throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                                SettingException
Adds a setting to the list of settings.

Parameters:
setting - Setting to add.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
SettingException

getPixelSize

double getPixelSize()
Returns the pixel size in micro meters.

Returns:
Pixel size in mico meters.

setPixelSize

void setPixelSize(double pixelSize,
                  int accessID)
                  throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                         SettingException
Sets the pixel size in micro meters.

Parameters:
pixelSize - Pixel size in mico meters.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
SettingException
